channel.title: How do i add a new shop?
channel.description: hey guys, i was jsut wondering how you can add a new shop... because i want to put some customs in it.. and also, how do i put items IN the shop? so i want to make a customs shop and make a bunch of customs and put them in it.

item.title: How do i add a new shop?
item.dc:creator: @cedrick cedrick
item.description:
@cedrick wrote:

if u need help just pm me ill teamviewer you. its pretty easy to add it

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add a new shop?

item.title: How do i add a new shop?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

In your shopassistant file (src-server-model-shops-shopassistant)

go down to any of the shops you see already and c*p the info , make a new shop id.

Go to shops.cfg (data-data)

make a new shop id in the cfg file.

go to actionhandler (src-server-model-players-actionhandler)

go down to cfirstclicknpc add the shop id like this

case #:
c.getShop,openShop(ID#);
break;

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add a new shop?
